---
title: Search
---

<div class="search-container">
  <div id="quarto-search"></div>
</div>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const searchElement = document.getElementById('quarto-search');
  if (window.quartoSearchManager) {
    window.quartoSearchManager.init({ 
      searchElement: searchElement,
      lunrOptions: {}, 
      resultsOptions: {}
    });
  }
});
</script>

<style>
.search-container {
  padding: 2rem 0;
}
</style>
